As an devout Mahuck-Skangerist, I am forbidden to participate in such things.  It would place my soul in peril of eternal condemnation.  


I think it's rather bad of you people, really, to expose a man of religion, such as myself, to temptation of this magnitude.  Certainly, I could use the money, as the locksmithing business is not going great guns and Mrs. Varden is having some health problems.  Then, of course, there's my daughter, Dolly, who's young and would like to have nice things and go to college and the like.  


I'm almost convinced it would be all right to take the money, but I am plagued with doubts.
